meanings.definition: The state or quality of being elderly.
meanings.sent1: Her elderliness was evident in the way she moved slowly and carefully.
meanings.sent2: The elderliness of the man was reflected in his white hair and wrinkled skin.
meanings.sent3: Despite her elderliness, she still had a youthful spirit and love for adventure.
meanings.sent4: The elderliness of the ancient tree was a testament to its enduring strength and wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The elderliness of the town was palpable, with its historic buildings and stories of the past.

meanings.definition: The condition of being advanced in age.
meanings.sent1: His elderliness was respected by all in the community for his wisdom and experience.
meanings.sent2: The elderliness of the cat was evident in its slow movements and calm demeanor.
meanings.sent3: Despite his elderliness, he still enjoyed playing with his grandchildren and telling jokes.
meanings.sent4: The elderliness of the mountain was a reminder of the passage of time and the beauty of age.
meanings.sent5: The elderliness of the building gave it a sense of history and character that was unmatched.
